title: Issue with Quarkus to connect with Redis Client
body:
### Describe the bug

My customer is trying the Quarkus framework to connect with Redis Client for enabling the ACL features. They have encountered the following errors:**ERR Client sent AUTH, but no password is set**


### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

Create Quarkus to connect with Redis with ACL following the steps described here [1],[2]

[1] https://quarkus.io/guides/redis
[2] https://docs.redis.com/latest/rc/security/database-security/passwords-users-roles/

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.0.0

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information
